title: ShareX 11.2.1
description:
ShareX - powerful multifunction utility for taking screenshots from the monitor screen with the ability to use additional tools for editing and processing. Working with the application is quite simple and convenient thanks to the well-thought-out and intuitive interface, where all the main options put to the left panel.
Additional Information:
Capture tab allows you to take a screenshot of the entire screen, a selected region of the active window and even completely arbitrary shape, as well as web-page or a long list. Under load in the program, you can add other image files by downloading them via the link from the clipboard, drag and drop, etc. Operations section for quick screen capture one of the options (objects, the whole area, active window) and video taking place on the screen action (video capture). By the way, can be used if desired, and keyboard shortcuts that have flexible options.

Upon receipt of the screenshot in ShareX have several options to proceed with the image of: edited in the editor, add watermark, copied to clipboard, printed, saved to a file, upload to server and other operations..
We should also highlight the ability to upload any files to the Web (Services tab downloads), allowing you to quickly locate a file on the Internet through social networks or cloud services. Supported portals Twitter,Google +, Tumblr, Reddit, and many others.

But that's not all. In a special section Tools you will find a few extra tools that might be useful in your job?

- color palette,
- Pipette
- Image Editor,
- Imposition of effects,
- Verification of the hash,
- IRC client
- DNS change,
- QR-code generator,
- Line,
- Association of images
- Thumbnails of the video,
- FTP client,
- Monitor and check the other.

RUN TO ADMIN
